definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: It is possible that you inadvertently took an excessive dose of an over-the-counter preparation.
sentences.chinese: 有可能是你把非處方藥喫過量了。

sentences.english: Preferably the starting material is dissolved in methanol and a stoichiometric excess of ammonium hydroxide is added.
sentences.chinese: 原料最好溶解於甲醇並加入過量氫氧化銨。

sentences.english: Excessive absorption or lack of halogen group elements could result in disease.
sentences.chinese: 過量攝入或缺乏鹵族元素，都可能導致疾病的發生。

sentences.english: Soviet Reactors can be overcharged, but will cause it to take damage.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯的反應堆可過量充電，但會受損。

sentences.english: But she kept overfeeding her cat just in case.
sentences.chinese: 但是她一直過量地喂着她的貓，以防萬一。

sentences.english: An excess of zinc, for example, can interfere with absorption of other nutrients, including iron and copper.
sentences.chinese: 比如，過量的鋅會妨礙鐵和銅等其他營養成分吸收。

sentences.english: It also set up the mechanism of over storage-nitrogen removal with SND.
sentences.chinese: 並提出了過量儲存SND脫氮作用機理。

sentences.english: However, before she could re-start she was found dead after a drug overdose.
sentences.chinese: 在夢露重新開始之前，她因服藥過量，被人發現死亡。

sentences.english: The excessive eating salt easy cause body moisture increased.
sentences.chinese: 過量食入鹽易造成身體水分增加。

sentences.english: Coordinate with production to aviod shortage and over production.
sentences.chinese: 配合生產部分嚴格控制產品的短缺和過量生產。

sentences.english: But you don't plan to snack, so you overeat.
sentences.chinese: 但是你並沒把喫零食列入計劃，所以你會喫得過量。

sentences.english: To avoid overfeeding, consider giving your dog low- or reduced-fat dairy products.
sentences.chinese: 爲了不至於餵過量，可以考慮使用低脂奶製品。

sentences.english: Can effectively prevent the objective environmental factors, triggered by excessive repletion .
sentences.chinese: 可有效防止因客觀環境因素引發的過量飽食。

sentences.english: Neither are there many studies to say that guzzling water will prevent headaches or flush toxins from your body.
sentences.chinese: 也沒有研究表明過量飲水可以防止頭痛或排毒。

sentences.english: So they are likely to face the problem of iodine too.
sentences.chinese: 這樣他們很可能面臨碘攝入過量的問題。

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
